data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of La Habana.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Habana, Cuba

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 502,400 people living in the state of La Habana.
Spirit, train the church of La Habana, Cuba to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in La Habana, Cuba.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Bauta
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Bauta, La Habana, Cuba.
Jesus, make the 225,459 people in the state of La Habana who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in La Habana, Cuba honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the state of La Habana, Cuba has a population of 502,400.

We estimate La Habana has 56,950 people who might know Jesus, 225,459 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 219,992 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in La Habana, Cuba by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: La Habana
location.cities_list: Güira de Melena, Artemisa, Bauta, San Antonio de los Baños, Mariel
location.cities_list_w_pop: Güira de Melena (69,879), Artemisa (68,073), Bauta (45,768), San Antonio de los Baños (42,724), Mariel (28,987)
